info.name: Child
info.author: Bruh Adventure, the Gamer Time Campaign

description.p: You are a carefree child adventurer, you have either lost your parents or grown to live without them and have left to adventure. Due to this, you cannot do things most fully grown adventurers can, however your appearance tends to attract people willing to help and assist you in endeavors. And while some may think you incapable, your size and appearance does bring some things into your favor, (and some out).

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: One type of Artisan's Tools, one type of Gaming Set
Equipment: Common clothes, 30 darts, a pouch containing 10 gold pieces

description.p: What was your reason to venture from the place you call home? Either select from the table or roll for one.

tr.td: Death of Guardian. Your parent or guardian has recently become deceased, causing you to go out and discover the world.
Providing. You need to go out to get basic necessities and coin for your family or yourself to live off of.
Forced Out. Either knowingly or unknowingly, you were kicked or thrown out of your home and require to live without it.
Studies. You left your home to increase your knowledge of the world or of a topic.
Adventure. You left your home because you have always been a natural adventurer and wish to see the world.
Coming of Age. You left your home to prove your maturity, regardless of age.
Family. You left your current home to visit other family than ones you have immediate access to.
Response. You left your home to assist with circumstances somewhere.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I find myself easily excited by mundane things.
I always find a need to talk to others about things that I have seen, even if they clearly aren't interested.
I find myself wishing to grow quickly for the benefits of adulthood, disregarding the benefits of childhood.
Lies I fabricate are often absurd and creative.
I find myself easily taking influence from those older or wiser than me.
I was raised to believe that those I look up to are always correct.
I try to make friends with everyone, even if they seem harsh to me or others.
I am easy to obtain the trust of, however once broken it is impossible to regain.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Rebellion. We have no obligation to listen to anyone, oftentimes the decider of rules are mislead. (Chaotic)
Redemption. Everyone has good in them, everyone can be redeemed, regardless of the evil act. (Good)
Order. Trust must be given to the authorities to protect the common people, they have our best interests in mind. (Lawful)
Power. There are some who are worth less than others, and deserve to be treated as such. (Evil)
Indifference. Get through life and don't trouble yourself in the issues of others, lift your own weight and nothing else. (Neutral)
Survival. Some issues are better left avoided than dealt with. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I find myself looking back on my parents or parental figures.
I would put myself into lethal danger multiple times if it meant I could save one of my friends.
I keep my distance from my family, as I have a troubled past with them.
I must maintain my families work, no matter the cost.
I must prove to those who didn't believe in me that I am capable of achieving great things.
I have made friends with an animal and would be horrified upon losing them.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I am considered talkative and loud by many.
I would jump off a bridge if my friends did it.
I would be the one to jump off the bridge first.
I show no respect towards any authoritative figures, including my parents.
I often tend to require support to do difficult things.
I find myself daydreaming in situations that require concentration.

description.p: You are or appear innocent to most strangers, some may grant you mercy if attacking or even strive to help you out on your quests. Work with your DM to find NPCs which will fall under this.
